data.name: This Enterprise CMS system saves time and allows you the freedom that you need to develop high-quality websites with a personal touch. We've streamlined the web development process.
data.value: 這個企業級內容管理系統可以讓你在短時間內創建一個高品質的網站。我們擁有專業、規範的流程。

data.name:
For a list of new added features and a quick start guide,
See: http://www.kooboo.com/documents
data.value:
新功能和快速入門，請參考：
http://www.kooboo.com/documents

data.name: Sign in to the CMS and create your first Kooboo website, default login is: admin/admin
data.value: 登錄Kooboo CMS 並創建您的第一個Kooboo網站, 默認登錄: admin/admin

data.name: Remember me 字段是必需的。
data.value: “記住我的登錄狀態”為必填欄位

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這個網站嗎？

data.name: The parent website which this new website will base on
The bad netword or some unknow reasons cause timeout, do you want to reload the page.
data.value: 網路問題或者未知原因導致超時，您要重新載入頁面嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這個頁面嗎？

data.name: Only alphameric and numeric are allowed in the field name
Custom template 字段是必需的。
Disallowed userkey chars. Replace chars that match this regular expression into hyphens
Enable versioning 字段是必需的。
Are you sure you want to delete this repository?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這個庫嗎？

data.name: Create a library to store your contents
data.value: 創建一個庫來存儲您的內容

data.name: Create folders or content types with custom fields
data.value: 用自定義欄位創建檔夾或內容類型

data.name:
Create text content
or upload media files
data.value:
創建一個文本內容
或者上傳媒體檔

data.name: A name cannot contain a space or any of the following characters:\/:*?<>|~
data.value: 名稱不能包含空格或以下字元:\/:*?<>|~

data.name: The name of your database to be created
data.value: 您要創建的資料庫的名稱

data.name:
Your front site culture, this is used to display currency,
date, number or other culture related content
data.value:
您的前臺網站的語言，用來顯示貨幣、
日期、數位或其語言相關的內容。

data.name: Your website domains
data.value: 您的網站的功能變數名稱

data.name:
The virtual path of your website.
You may create a subsite eg. www.kooboo.com/china, china is the SitePath.
data.value:
您的網站的虛擬路徑。
您可能例如 www.kooboo.com/china的子網站，china 就是網站的路徑。

data.name: Give your wesite a version number, it can be any number as you like
data.value: 給網站設定一個版本號，它可以是任何數字。

data.name:
Use debug on development and use release on live site.
Release mode utilizes CSS/JS compression and other techniques
data.value:
開發時使用debug和發佈時使用release。
Release 模式採用CSS/JS 壓縮和其他技術。

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete these items?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這些項目嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to reset the templates of this item?
data.value: 您確定要重置這個專案的範本嗎？

data.name: You have not select any items!
Are you sure you want to remove these items?
data.value: 您確定要移除這些項目嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to delect these items?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這些項目嗎？

data.name: Import from uploaded new template files or existing site templates.
data.value: 導入新上傳的範本或從現有的網站導入範本

data.name: The site is offline, please remove this file to take it online.
data.value: 網站已經脫機，刪除此檔使它聯機。

data.name: The repository is offline, please remove this file to take it online.
data.value: 庫已經脫機，刪除此檔使它聯機。

data.name:
This item has not been published yet.
Click to publish this item.
data.value:
此項目沒有發佈
點擊發佈它。

data.name: Select a color or insert a hex code value.
data.value: 選擇一個顏色或者插入一個16進制值

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這個圖片嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete the link?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這些鏈結嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
data.value: 您確定要刪除此專案嗎？

data.name: Network error, the action has been cancelled
The name of your website how it would be displayed on this CMS
data.value: 系統如何顯示網站名稱

data.name:
The culture shown on your website.
This is used to display currency, date, number and other culture related content
data.value:
站點的顯示文化
不同的文化會有不同的貨幣，時間，數值的顯示不同。

data.name: Load theme CSS files from the theme folder
data.value: 載入皮膚目錄下的樣式檔

data.name: The virtual path of your website. You may create a subsite eg. www.kooboo.com/china, china is the SitePath.
data.value: 站點的虛擬目錄，可以映射類似：www.kooboo.com/china，china 就是站點虛擬目錄。

data.name: Use debug on development and use release on live site. Release mode utilizes CSS/JS compression and other techniques
data.value: 在開發時使用Debug模式；發佈後使用Release模式。發Release模式會合並和壓縮腳本樣式。

data.name: Enables you to edit content on the front end of your website
data.value: 允許在前臺頁面中編輯內容

data.name: Shows the sitemap as the start page in the menu
data.value: 在開始頁顯示站點地圖

data.name: Load JQuery and JQuery validation files
data.value: 載入 JQuery and JQuery 驗證腳本樣式檔

data.name: Enable version control on Layout, View and Page
data.value: 啟用佈局、視圖、頁面的版本控制

data.name: The FROM email address of emails sent out by system, for example user registration confirmation email
data.value: 發送郵箱，用於發送系統郵件。

data.name: The receiver's Email addresses of your contact form
data.value: 接收郵箱，用於接收系統發送的系統郵件。

data.name:
Add an user to your website
The user must be created first under Users menu
data.value:
添加一個用戶到站點
用戶必須在系統中創建好

data.name: Define your error redirect pages
data.value: 定義請求出錯時的重定向頁面

data.name: Replace the existing files when they have the same name
The collection of pages to be published
Are you sure you want to leave current page
data.value: 您確定要離開當前頁面嗎？

data.name: Please input a new position name.
Are you sure you want to remove this item?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這條資料嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to replace this template?
data.value: 您確定要替換這個範本嗎？

data.name: a name cannot contain a space, a single or double quote.
data.value: 名稱不能含有空格、單引號和雙引號。

data.name: This name is being used by other parameters.
List of contents in the selected folder
List of contents in the category folders
This dataname is being used by other datarule.
Query condition filter, you may use value from URL string, for example: {querystringkey}
data.value: 查詢過濾條件，可以從URL傳參中取值，比如：{querystringkey}

data.name: Theme contains both CSS and image files. Folders directly under the Theme root will be considered as one theme. ThemeRules.txt is a speical text file used to write your CSS loading rules.
data.value: 皮膚會包含樣式和圖片檔。皮膚根目錄下的目錄被當作一個皮膚。ThemeRules.txt可以指定特殊的載入規則。

data.name: Are you sure you want to close this window.
data.value: 您確定要關閉當前窗口嗎？

data.name: Map a MVC action link to another page
The Folder name field is required.
The URL format with parameters of content detail page. e.g.: /article/detail/{userkey}
Include all content fields in the search index or select special fields.
data.value: 包含所有欄位到索引檔或者選擇部分欄位

data.name: The Include all fields field is required.
Name of your field, excludes the following characters:\/:*?<>|
data.value: 名稱欄位不能包括以下字元：\/:*?<>|

data.name: Descriptive label of your field on the content editing page
data.value: 在內容編輯頁面時顯示的欄位文本

data.name: The way that you would like to input your content
data.value: 你喜歡的內容輸入方式

data.name: Order of your field in the content editing page
Primary fields will be used as a title or summary to describe your content item
data.value: 用於描述內容的概要資訊

data.name: Show this field in the CMS content list page
data.value: 在內容列表顯示該欄位

data.name: Input tip while users entering content
Allows null value in this field
Enable the modification of this field in the content editing page.
data.value: 在內容修改頁面中可以修改欄位值

data.name: This name is being used by other column.
Are you sure you want to publish this item?
data.value: 您確定要發佈當前內容嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to unpublish this item?
data.value: 您確定要取消發佈這條資料嗎？

data.name: You have not select any item!
Are you sure you want to leave page? All your changes might be lost.
data.value: 所有未保存的資料將會丟失，您確實要離開當前頁面嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to change layout
The title that can be used by page content, this value can be accessed via API: @Page_Context.Current.ContentTitle
data.value: 標題能作為頁面內容使用，使用API: @Page_Context.Current.ContentTitle訪問其值。

data.name: Load the theme css files from the system selected theme folder
Load JavaScript files from the site script folder

The type of your page, used to mark them differently in the sitemap
Default: select this option if you do not know your page type
Static: contains only manually input static content
Dynamic: contains dynamic content from database either via the datarule or your own API query
data.value:
頁面類型
默認： 系統自動判斷
靜態： 指定這是一個靜態頁面
動態： 指定這是一個調用資料規則或API的動態頁面。

data.name: The Type of page field is required.

AbsouluteExpiration: a cache entry should be evicted after a specified duration.
SlidingExpiration: a cache entry should be evicted if it has not been accessed in a given span of time.
data.value:
AbsouluteExpiration： 緩存項將在一定的時間後過期。
SlidingExpiration： 緩存項不可使用一定時間後過期。

data.name: Make this page accessiable from the menu API
data.value: 該頁面可以被頁面導航API調用

data.name: Make this page accesiable from the Crumb path API.
data.value: 該頁面可以顯示在導航麵包屑

data.name:
The title tag and value that appear in the page HTML header and also used by browsers as the page title.
This value can be accessed via API: @Html.FrontHtml().HtmlTitle()
data.value:
頁面標題
使用API：@Html.FrontHtml().HtmlTitle()可以訪問其值

data.name: Give your page an alternative name. This new name will be used when generating page links
data.value: 為頁面指定其他的URL，可以生成與頁面名不同的頁面位址。

data.name:
Customize the page URL to anyway you like.
Use {key} to match the URL query string.
For example: {userkey}_othertext to replace parameter "?userkey=" into static URL
data.value:
自定義URL地址格式。
{key}對應位址參數名。
比如：用 {userkey}_othertext 替換“?userkey=”，使其變為靜態URL位址。

data.name:
If checked, links within this module will not contains
URL parameters of other modules in the same page
data.value:
如果選中，該模組的鏈結在同一頁面將不包含
其他模組的URL參數。

data.name: Initial MVC controller when this module first loaded on a page
data.value: 頁面請求時，載入的Module的默認controller。

data.name: Initial MVC action when this module first loaded on a page
data.value: 頁面請求時，載入的Module的默認action。

data.name: Are you sure you want to remove this?
data.value: 您確定要刪除這條資料嗎？

data.name: This site will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?
data.value: 該站點將會被永久刪除，你確定嗎？

data.name: Delete the associated content database.
data.value: 刪除相關的內容資料庫

data.name: The image size is too big for this layout. Are you sure you want to use this size?
data.value: 圖片太大，是否繼續使用該圖片尺寸？

data.name: The Enable versioning field is required.
The Enable workflow field is required.
The Enable broadcasting field is required.
The Custom template field is required.
The Keep content stataus field is required.
The Publish date field is required.
The Offline date field is required.
Are you sure you want to publish this item.
data.value: 您確定要發佈此項內容嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to unpublish this item.
data.value: 您確定要取消發佈這條資料嗎？

data.name: The culture represents the current culture used by the Resource Manager to look up culture-specific resources at run time.
The page to add a content
The front site content list display
The front site content detail display
Are you sure you want to leave this page
data.value: 您確定要離開此頁面嗎？

data.name: Are you sure you want to reset this template
data.value: 您確定要重置這個專案的範本嗎？

data.name: The Remember me field is required.
data.value: “記住我的登錄狀態”為必填項

data.name: 'Confirm new password' and 'NewPassword' do not match.

{0}
To change your password, click on the following link:
{1}
Kooboo CMS
data.value:
{0}
點擊下面鏈結修改密碼：
{1}
Kooboo CMS

data.name: An email with instructions to choose a new password has been sent to you.
data.value: 密碼重置鏈結已發到您的郵箱。

data.name: Enter your username and then click Continue.
data.value: 輸入用戶名後點擊繼續

data.name: We'll email you a link to a page where you can easily create a new password.
data.value: 我們會發送給你一個修改密碼頁面鏈結。

data.name:
{0}

To change your password, click on the following link:

{1}
data.value:
{0}

點擊下面鏈結修改密碼：

{1}

data.name: Select your new password and enter it below.
The Redirect to home page field is required.
Test if Kooboo cms has read/write permission on this folder.
data.value: 測試Kooboo CMS是否可以在這個目錄讀寫檔

data.name: Site domain setting
data.value: 站點功能變數名稱設置

data.name: The SMTP server was not correctly setup, please configure it under System\Settings\SMTP
data.value: SMTP帳戶沒有設置，請到“系統\設置\STMP”選項下設置。

data.name: No domain is assigned for this website, please configure it under System\Settings
data.value: 沒有功能變數名稱指到該站點，請到“系統\設置”下修改。

data.name: Summary fields will be used as a title or summary to describe your content item
data.value: 概述欄位用來描述內容項

data.name: Include this page content in the search index
data.value: 在搜索索引中包含此頁內容

data.name: The Search index field is required.
Give your page an alternative name. This new name will be used when generating page links. Start with '/' to indicate using as absolute path.
data.value: 為頁面設置一個備用名，該名稱將用來生成以“/”開頭的絕對位址。

data.name: This exception is caused by the wrong setting of the url route of this page. Please check this setting to correct the error. Page name:{0}
data.value: 該錯誤由不正確的頁面路由設置，頁面名稱：{0}

data.name: The system will automatically index new or updated content, rebuilding all may take a long time, are you sure you want to continue?
data.value: 系統將自動索引新的內容，重建可能要一些時間，確定繼續嗎？

data.name: Indexed folder '{0}' - content title '{1}'
data.value: 已建索引目錄'{0}' - 內容標題'{1}'

data.name: Delete index content title '{1}' from folder '{0}'
data.value: 從目錄 '{0}'刪除索引內容標題 '{1}'

data.name: The content item display order in the content list page. Default is Sequence with possibility to change the order of each content item
data.value: 內容的顯示排序欄位，默認的Sequence可以調整項目的排序。

data.name: Network error, the action has been cancelled.
The attempt to copy has failed.
The attempt to delete has failed.
The attempt to publish has failed.
The attempt to save has failed.
